results.name: default/mysql-statefulset

error.Text: StatefulSet uses the service default/mysql-headless which does not exist.

results.details:
Error: The StatefulSet references a non-existent service named "default/mysql-headless".

Solution: 
1. Verify the service name in the StatefulSet spec.
2. Create the "mysql-headless" service in the "default" namespace.
3. Ensure the service is correctly configured for StatefulSet use.

results.name: default/wordpress-deployment-79f654d99b-4p8ls

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.
